name: Interatomic
description:
You are the last qualified worker. You have a job to do...

Made for Ludem Dare 49. Play as the sole worker of nuclear power plant. The job is simple manage power and coolant. Make the most amount of energy the powerplant doesn't overheat or overcool.

Controls are

WASD for movement 

E to interact with highlighted object

This game has many issues that will hopefully be sorted out in a few days, the original build will always be available for download though. -Sweer

(Ps from TeHwolf) It doesn't look like the tutorial isn't working hopefully that will be fixed also maybe you might be able to figure how to play without it. 

Check out the full OST on youtube -TeHwolf
